questions.question1Part1.1: What new hobby would you like to try??

questions.question3Part1.1: Do you prefer traveling by plane, train, or car?

questions.question1Part1.2: Describe what you see in these 2 pictures.

questions.question2Part1.2: What are the advantages of reading e-books?

questions.question3Part1.2: Do you think paper books will some day disappear?

questions.question1Part2: Tell me about an activity you do with your family.
How does it affect your relationships?

questions.statement: Homework Should Be Banned in Schools.

For.fact1: Allows students more free time for hobbies and family.

Against.fact1: Reinforces learning outside of school hours.
Against.fact2: Helps students develop time management skills.
Against.fact3: Prepares students for exams and assessments.
